00019 #ifndef PDB_STRUCTURE_HEADER_INCLUDED
00020 #define PDB_STRUCTURE_HEADER_INCLUDED
00021 #include <PDBBase.H>
00022 
00023 namespace SimSite3D{
00024 
00026 class residue_t{
00027 public:
00028   residue_t()
00029   {
00030     name = NULL_RESIDUE;
00031     number = 0; 
00032     chainID = '@';
00033     icode = '@';
00034     atoms_begin = atom_t::NULL_ATOM_VCI;
00035     atoms_end = atom_t::NULL_ATOM_VCI;
00036     is_MODRES = false;
00037     is_HET = false;
00038   }
00039 
00041   residue_t(atom_vci atom)
00042   {
00043     name = atom->res;
00044     number = atom->res_num;
00045     chainID = atom->chainID;
00046     icode = atom->iCode;
00047     atoms_begin = atom;
00048     atoms_end = atom;
00049     is_MODRES = false;
00050     is_HET = atom->is_hetero;
00051   }
00052 
00053   ~residue_t() {;}
00054 
00055   atom_vci 
00056   get_atom(atom_type atom_name) const
00057   {
00058     for(atom_vci AA = atoms_begin; AA < atoms_end; ++AA)
00059       if(AA->name == atom_name) return AA;
00060     return atom_t::NULL_ATOM_VCI;
00061   }
00062 
00063   residue_type name;     
00064   uint number;           
00065   char icode;            
00066   char chainID;          
00067   atom_vci atoms_begin;  
00068   atom_vci atoms_end;    
00069   bool is_MODRES;        
00070   bool is_HET;           
00071 };
00072 
00073 typedef residue_t* residue_ptr;
00074 typedef std::vector<residue_t> residue_vec;
00075 typedef std::vector<residue_t>::iterator residue_vi;
00076 typedef std::vector<residue_t>::const_iterator residue_vci;
00077 
00078 typedef struct {
00079   residue_vci residues_begin; 
00080   residue_vci residues_end;   
00081   char chainID;                      
00082 }chain_t;
00083 
00084 typedef chain_t* chain_ptr;
00085 typedef std::vector<chain_t> chain_vec;
00086 typedef std::vector<chain_t>::iterator chain_iter;
00087 typedef std::vector<chain_t>::const_iterator chain_const_iter;
00088
